headers.subject: [WikiEN-l] Citizendium charter ratified
headers.received: from localhost ([127.0.0.1]:35306 helo=lily.esams.wikimedia.org) by lily.knams.wikimedia.org with esmtp (Exim 4.69) (envelope-from <wikien-l-bounces@lists.wikimedia.org>) id 1Oz6Rl-0006KU-Lb; Fri, 24 Sep 2010 11:28:09 +0000

from mail-qy0-f181.google.com ([209.85.216.181]:59677) by lily.knams.wikimedia.org with esmtp (Exim 4.69) (envelope-from <dgerard@gmail.com>) id 1Oz6Ri-0006Jt-Tr for wikien-l@lists.wikimedia.org; Fri, 24 Sep 2010 11:28:07 +0000

body.para: Citizendium is no longer Larry Sanger's personal project, but an independent group run by its community:
The regulars hope the Charter will help revitalise Citizendium. This would be good for everyone, I think.
body.footer: _______________________________________________ WikiEN-l mailing list WikiEN-l@lists.wikimedia.org To unsubscribe from this mailing list, visit: https://lists.wikimedia.org/mailman/listinfo/wikien-l
